post.body: - i'm with you... should of gone to bed 2 hours ago. g'night!
talking about curling up in some new sheets... and you wonder why you have a stalker? haha
mint.com is pretty great, and now that they have an iphone app i'm totally sold.
- my santa's little helper - Yuengling's Lord Chesterfield Ale.
- aha! i think that may just be it. i've been wanting to see kung-fu panda for awhile now.
Totally agree. it has such a great groove to it.
- i can check to see if the infantree can host your photoshop group. we'll chat....
hello #things, haven't used you in a while. trying to get a jump start on a '09 #resolution - Get Organized!
trying to get back into a blogging routine... this is going to be tuff.
is getting a head start to the week. ✓ write to-do lists, ✓ review meetings, ✓ send client emails... lot's more to do.
heading up to ephrata to visit some family.
is heading up to @skiroundtop for the rest of the day.
lancaster had an earthquake last night... crazy.
getting ready to watch Hancock.
feels like a nice long nap is in order.
Really excited to break out some of the toys Eli got yesterday.
at the inlaws for the evening. trying to figure out which movie to watch. any ideas?
RT @kmueller62: great new resrouce from @sarabozich . a list of local bloggers in Central PA http://is.gd/djqY
</work> Time to enjoy family and friends. wishing you all a Happy Holiday!
got "Meet The Robinsons" for Christmas - by far one of my favorite movies of all time.
